author: dims
msg: - consolidate the AXIS2 home lookup to one location (static method getAxis2HomeDirectory in AxisConfiguration)
- don't use tmpdir use user.home, long running servers may get whacked by cron jobs that clean tmp directory

author: vmassol
msg: Forgot to commit some files from previous commit (related to MCLOVER-5) + added some ignore files.

author: vmassol
msg: - Removed @readonly javadoc tag in CloverInstrumentMojo. For some reason this is causing an error when run in a reactor. No idea why. If someone knows please let me know so that I can document it.
- Added it tests for running clover site in multiprojects
- Fixed report mojo: we need to wait for clover to have flushed its coverage data (a leftover from MCLOVER-4)
Note 1: I have no idea how to share more code betwee report mojos and main build mojos. See http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MNG-1886. Any idea is most welcome.
Note 2: The multiproject build is still not fully working as the generated does not container the clover report. Still trying to figure out why...
